name: Une faible lumière
description:
After a tree has passed over your car, you are forced to cross the snowy plains of northern Europe to return home in the dark ...

This game was made as a submission for the Scream Jam 2021 by a group of student in L2 and L3Pro from L3Di (Laval in France).

A lot of stuff are currently unfinished but we will mostly work on it so don't hesitate to give us some feedback !

Game Design and Integration :

Tom "Lazaraeal" Gatineau / Steven "Lioniks" Favre

Modeling and Texturing : 

Echinops / Arthur Bouhier-Hubault  / Erwann  / Laura "Akume" Moget / Michael Gargiulo / Emma Provot / Christina

Programmation : 

Tom "Lazaraeal" Gatineau / Clara "DwenShell" Giraud

Animations : 

Henri-Pierre Billet / Mathéo Carrel / Yvain "Octy"

Concept Art : 

Echinops / Mahé
